message:
Hey guys! I'm sure I'm not alone in the struggle with multiple Google accounts, particularly those of us using Google Apps just to get Gmail on our own domains. It's crazy how messy everything gets after a while (e.g. which account is your actual profile?). I had an idea on how Google could solve that and would love your opinion and up vote. Maybe this gets to someone at Google… :) 

Here's the HN item link: http://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=2715669 

Thanks guys :)
